files.patch:
@@ -740,0 +740,6 @@ + *

+ * If the given string contains any {@code '\0'} characters, they will be + * copied as well. This means that, depending on the method used to read + * the string, such as {@link MemorySegment#getUtf8String(long)}, the string + * will appear truncated when read again. + *

@@ -74,0 +74,5 @@ + *

+ * If the given string contains any {@code '\0'} characters, they will be + * copied as well. This means that, depending on the method used to read + * the string, such as {@link MemorySegment#getUtf8String(long)}, the string + * will appear truncated when read again.
